blurb.B1: Maverick will be impressed with your audition if you pass at least two out of three of the Lie (40), Intimidate (65), and Intimidate (100) checks,
blurb.B2: regardless of what other choices you make.
blurb.B3: Alternatively, if you kill the actors he will be impressed no matter what.

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: That was brilliant stuff. Do you write your own material?

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'm gonna have to fire the writing staff. What do those anemic fuckwits know about dialogue, anyway?

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'm thinking a whole new script. More pirates. Bigger explosions. You flicking a Stogie Slim into a barrel of gasoline - marketing says that kind of action sells tickets!

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: Here, this is for your work today. I'll be in touch once we get that script!

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: Amazing. Just firm up that jawline and you'll be a triple threat!
